panels.description: Сколько уникальных пользовательских проектов участвуют в обучении

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT (w.owner_uuid, w.project_uuid)) AS total_user_projects
FROM mw_schema.ways w
JOIN mw_schema.projects p
  ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
WHERE p.is_deleted = false;

panels.title: Total users projects

panels.description: Progress vs Completion - наличие монотонной связи между прогрессом пользователя и фактом полного завершения.

targets.rawSql:
WITH base AS (
  SELECT
    (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed))::numeric / COUNT(*) AS progress_ratio,
    CASE
      WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY w.owner_uuid, w.project_uuid
),
ranked AS (
  SELECT
    rank() OVER (ORDER BY progress_ratio) AS r_progress,
    rank() OVER (ORDER BY is_completed)   AS r_completed
  FROM base
)
SELECT corr(r_progress, r_completed) AS spearman_rho
FROM ranked;

panels.title: Spearman correlation

panels.description: Количество пользовательских проектов, в которых завершены все пути обучения.

targets.rawSql:
WITH per_user_project AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_cnt,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_cnt
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS completed_user_projects
FROM per_user_project
WHERE completed_cnt = total_cnt;

panels.title: Completed user projects

panels.description: какой процент пользователей доходит до конца обучения

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ROUND(
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE
      WHEN completed_cnt = total_cnt THEN (owner_uuid, project_uuid)
    END)::numeric
    / COUNT(DISTINCT (owner_uuid, project_uuid)),
    4
  ) AS completion_rate
FROM (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_cnt,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_cnt
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
) s;

panels.title: Completion rate

targets.rawSql:
WITH up AS (
  SELECT user_uuid, COUNT(DISTINCT project_uuid) AS projects_cnt
  FROM mw_schema.users_projects
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  ROUND(AVG(projects_cnt)::numeric, 2) AS avg_projects_per_user
FROM up;

WITH up AS (
  SELECT user_uuid, COUNT(DISTINCT project_uuid) AS projects_cnt
  FROM mw_schema.users_projects
  GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
  MAX(projects_cnt) AS max_projects_per_user
FROM up;

panels.description: Показывает, сколько пользователей дошли до каждого уровня прогресса.

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid   AS user_uuid,
    w.project_uuid AS project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) AS completed_ways,
    (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true))::numeric / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0) AS progress_ratio,
    CASE
      WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) = COUNT(*)
      THEN 1 ELSE 0
    END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
thresholds AS (
  SELECT round(x::numeric, 2) AS t
  FROM generate_series(0, 1, 0.1) AS x   -- 0.0, 0.1, ... 1.0
)
SELECT
  (t.t * 100)::int || '%' AS progress_ge,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.progress_ratio >= t.t) AS users_reached_ge,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.progress_ratio >= t.t AND ds.is_completed = 1) AS users_completed_from_ge,
  ROUND(
    (COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.progress_ratio >= t.t AND ds.is_completed = 1))::numeric
      / NULLIF(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.progress_ratio >= t.t), 0),
    4
  ) AS p_complete_given_progress_ge
FROM thresholds t
CROSS JOIN ds
GROUP BY t.t
ORDER BY t.t;

panels.title: Learning funnel by progress (%)

panels.description: на каком этапе прогресса обучения находятся пользовательские проекты в текущий момент (позволяет выявить зоны застревания)

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
binned AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN total_ways = 0 THEN '0%'
      ELSE
        CASE
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.1 THEN '0-10%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.2 THEN '10-20%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.3 THEN '20-30%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.4 THEN '30-40%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.5 THEN '40-50%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.6 THEN '50-60%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.7 THEN '60-70%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.8 THEN '70-80%'
          WHEN completed_ways::numeric / total_ways < 0.9 THEN '80-90%'
          ELSE '90-100%'
        END
    END AS step
  FROM ds
)
SELECT
  step,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM binned
GROUP BY step
ORDER BY
  CASE step
    WHEN '0-10%' THEN 1
    WHEN '10-20%' THEN 2
    WHEN '20-30%' THEN 3
    WHEN '30-40%' THEN 4
    WHEN '40-50%' THEN 5
    WHEN '50-60%' THEN 6
    WHEN '60-70%' THEN 7
    WHEN '70-80%' THEN 8
    WHEN '80-90%' THEN 9
    WHEN '90-100%' THEN 10
  END;

panels.title: Distribution of projects by progress stage

panels.description: Размер выборки (sample size): сколько пользовательских проектов (user×project) имеют конкретное количество выполненных задач (completed ways).

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  completed_ways,
  COUNT(*) AS sample_size
FROM ds
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: Sample size

panels.description: вероятность полного завершения проекта в зависимости от числа активных дней (дней с дневным отчётом) в рамках проекта

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid   AS user_uuid,
    w.project_uuid AS project_uuid,

    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways,

    CASE
      WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS is_completed

  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p
    ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
   AND p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
activity AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid   AS user_uuid,
    w.project_uuid AS project_uuid,
    COUNT(DISTINCT dr.created_at::date) AS active_days
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p
    ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
   AND p.is_deleted = false
  LEFT JOIN mw_schema.day_reports dr
    ON dr.way_uuid = w.uuid
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
base AS (
  SELECT
    ds.user_uuid,
    ds.project_uuid,
    COALESCE(a.active_days, 0) AS active_days,
    ds.is_completed
  FROM ds
  LEFT JOIN activity a USING (user_uuid, project_uuid)
),
binned AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN active_days = 0 THEN '0 days'
      WHEN active_days BETWEEN 1 AND 2 THEN '1-2 days'
      WHEN active_days BETWEEN 3 AND 5 THEN '3-5 days'
      WHEN active_days BETWEEN 6 AND 10 THEN '6-10 days'
      WHEN active_days BETWEEN 11 AND 20 THEN '11-20 days'
      ELSE '21+ days'
    END AS active_days_bin,
    is_completed
  FROM base
)
SELECT
  active_days_bin,
  COUNT(*) AS sample_size,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric, 4) AS completion_probability
FROM binned
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY
  CASE active_days_bin
    WHEN '0 days' THEN 0
    WHEN '1-2 days' THEN 1
    WHEN '3-5 days' THEN 2
    WHEN '6-10 days' THEN 3
    WHEN '11-20 days' THEN 4
    ELSE 5
  END;

panels.title: Completion probability by active days

panels.description:
P(complete | completed ways ≥ N)
условная вероятность завершения при достижении N путей.

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid AS user_uuid,
    w.project_uuid AS project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) AS completed_ways,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) = COUNT(*) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
levels AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT completed_ways FROM ds
)
SELECT
  l.completed_ways,
  ROUND(
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.completed_ways >= l.completed_ways AND ds.is_completed = 1)::numeric
    / NULLIF(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.completed_ways >= l.completed_ways), 0),
    4
  ) AS completion_probability
FROM levels l
CROSS JOIN ds
GROUP BY l.completed_ways
ORDER BY l.completed_ways;

panels.title: Activation / No-return point

panels.description:
P(complete | completed ways= N)
эмпирическая вероятность завершения среди проектов с ровно N путей.

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid AS user_uuid,
    w.project_uuid AS project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) AS completed_ways,
    CASE
      WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) = COUNT(*)
      THEN 1 ELSE 0
    END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  completed_ways,
  COUNT(*) AS user_project_cnt,
  SUM(is_completed) AS completed_cnt,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric * 100, 1) AS completion_probability
FROM ds
GROUP BY completed_ways
ORDER BY completed_ways;

panels.title: Completion probability vs completed ways

panels.description: Среднее количество путей, которые пользователь завершает в рамках проекта

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  p.name AS project_name,
  COUNT(*) AS user_project_cnt,
  ROUND(AVG(total_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_total_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(completed_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_completed_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric, 4) AS completion_rate
FROM ds
JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = ds.project_uuid
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY user_project_cnt DESC;

panels.title: AVG completed ways by project

panels.description: сколько пользователей участвовало в каждом проекте

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  p.name AS project_name,
  COUNT(*) AS user_project_cnt,
  ROUND(AVG(total_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_total_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(completed_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_completed_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric, 4) AS completion_rate
FROM ds
JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = ds.project_uuid
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY user_project_cnt DESC;

panels.title: Project popularity (number of users)

panels.description: Доля пользователей, которые полностью завершили проект

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  p.name AS project_name,
  COUNT(*) AS user_project_cnt,
  ROUND(AVG(total_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_total_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(completed_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_completed_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric, 4) AS completion_rate
FROM ds
JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = ds.project_uuid
GROUP BY 1

panels.title: Completion rate by project

panels.description: сложность проекта (среднее количество путей) и вероятность его завершения

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  p.name AS project_name,
  COUNT(*) AS user_project_cnt,
  ROUND(AVG(total_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_total_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(completed_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_completed_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric, 4) AS completion_rate
FROM ds
JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = ds.project_uuid
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY user_project_cnt DESC;

panels.title: Completion rate vs project complexity

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  p.name AS project_name,
  COUNT(*) AS user_project_cnt,
  ROUND(AVG(total_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_total_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(completed_ways)::numeric, 2) AS avg_completed_ways,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric, 4) AS completion_rate
FROM ds
JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = ds.project_uuid
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY user_project_cnt DESC;

SELECT
    p.name,
    COUNT(w.uuid) AS ways_count
FROM mw_schema.projects p
JOIN mw_schema.ways w
    ON w.project_uuid = p.uuid
WHERE p.is_deleted = FALSE
GROUP BY p.name;

WITH user_projects AS (
  SELECT
    u.uuid AS user_uuid,
    COUNT(DISTINCT up.project_uuid) AS projects_cnt
  FROM mw_schema.users u
  LEFT JOIN mw_schema.users_projects up
    ON up.user_uuid = u.uuid
  GROUP BY u.uuid
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN projects_cnt = 0 THEN '0 projects'
    WHEN projects_cnt = 1 THEN '1 project'
    ELSE projects_cnt::text || ' projects'
  END AS projects_label,
  COUNT(*) AS users_cnt
FROM user_projects
GROUP BY projects_cnt
ORDER BY projects_cnt;

panels.description: как меняется вероятность завершения проекта и размер выборки пользователей в зависимости от количества выполненных путей

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid   AS user_uuid,
    w.project_uuid AS project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) AS completed_ways,
    CASE
      WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed = true) = COUNT(*) THEN 1 ELSE 0
    END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
levels AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT completed_ways FROM ds
),
prob AS (
  SELECT
    l.completed_ways,

    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.completed_ways >= l.completed_ways) AS users_reached_ge,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.completed_ways >= l.completed_ways AND ds.is_completed = 1) AS users_completed,

    ROUND(
      COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.completed_ways >= l.completed_ways AND ds.is_completed = 1)::numeric
      / NULLIF(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE ds.completed_ways >= l.completed_ways), 0),
      4
    ) AS completion_probability

  FROM levels l
  CROSS JOIN ds
  GROUP BY l.completed_ways
)
SELECT
  completed_ways,
  users_reached_ge,
  users_completed,
  completion_probability
FROM prob
ORDER BY completed_ways;

panels.title: Progress-based completion probability (cumulative)

options.content:
## Верхний график — кумулятивный (“дошли минимум до N”).
Показывает вероятность завершения проекта среди Всех пользователей, дошедших минимум до заданного уровня прогресса.

- Sample size — количество user-project пар, которые выполнили как минимум N путей

- Users completed — сколько из них в итоге завершили проект

- Completion probability —вероятность завершения при условии, что пользователь дошёл минимум до N путей

## Нижний график , точечный (“ровно N”)
Отражает поведение пользователей на конкретном уровне прогресса и используется для оценки стабильности и надёжности метрик.

Для каждого значения Completed ways = N:

- Sample size — количество user-project пар c ровно N выполненными путями

- Completion probability — доля завершивших проект именно из этой группы

targets.rawSql:
WITH ds AS (
  SELECT
    w.owner_uuid,
    w.project_uuid,
    COUNT(*) AS total_ways,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) AS completed_ways,
    CASE
      WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE w.is_completed) = COUNT(*) THEN 1
      ELSE 0
    END AS is_completed
  FROM mw_schema.ways w
  JOIN mw_schema.projects p ON p.uuid = w.project_uuid
  WHERE p.is_deleted = false
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  completed_ways,
  COUNT(*) AS sample_size,
  ROUND(AVG(is_completed)::numeric, 3) AS completion_probability
FROM ds
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;
